Context:
Fees for the 2023–2024 academic year:
- Campus Service Enhanced Technology Fee: $27.00
- Athletic Capital fund fee: $17.80

Students may apply for an exemption from these fees if they have comparable coverage. The opt-out deadline for applications is unspecified in the text. Part-time students are not eligible for insurance coverage.

Refunds and academic penalties are based on the date a completed and signed program withdrawal form is submitted to the Registrar’s Office. Some programs do not refund material fees. A minimum of four weeks is required to process a refund, with an administrative charge of $20 applying for replacement cheques.

Withdrawal fee for most post-secondary programs: $1000

Contact information for opting out and inquiries regarding international student withdrawals:
- Student Association Benefits Office: 416-415-5000, ext. 2443
- Email: intlwithdrawal@georgebrown.ca
- Phone: 416-415-5000, ext. 2115.
